Name: Jason Roy
Bowl: England, Surrey, Chittagong Kings, Sydney Thunder, Sydney Sixers, Lahore Qalandars, Gujarat Lions, Benoni Zalmi, Delhi Capitals, Quetta Gladiators, England Lions, Nelson Mandela Bay Giants, Bengal Tigers, Sylhet Sixers, Perth Scorchers, Team Buttler, Oval Invincibles, Sunrisers Hyderabad
Teams: England, Surrey, Chittagong Kings, Sydney Thunder, Sydney Sixers, Lahore Qalandars, Gujarat Lions, Benoni Zalmi, Delhi Capitals, Quetta Gladiators, England Lions, Nelson Mandela Bay Giants, Bengal Tigers, Sylhet Sixers, Perth Scorchers, Team Buttler, Oval Invincibles, Sunrisers Hyderabad
Bio: There is almost no role in a cricket side that Shoaib Malik hasn't filled,so much so that over ten years into his career,nobody is sure what his precise  best role is,he is a batting allrounder,though he started his career as an off-break bowler,Partly the problem is that he is capable,of fulfilling many roles with some competence,He has had success as an opener in Tests  ODIs; he has been game-changing as a limited-overs one down  dangerous as a lower-order slogger; often he has been a stodgy middle-order bulwark,he can be brutal anywhere
